bioconda.name: bioconductor-spacepac
bioconda.summary: Identification of Mutational Clusters in 3D Protein Space via Simulation.

biotools.summary: Identifies clustering of somatic mutations in proteins via a simulation approach while considering the protein's tertiary structure.

bioschemas.summary: Identifies clustering of somatic mutations in proteins via a simulation approach while considering the protein's tertiary structure.
